articles.headline: Easy Online Banking
articles.subHeadline: It's has never been so easy
articles.content: Whether you are using Afterwards for personal use, freelancer or managing a small business. Banking is important part of everyones life
articles.author: Afterwards

articles.headline: Get Your Employer Identification Number (EIN)
articles.content:
First what is a Employer Idetification Number also known as a EIN? Think of it as a Social Security Number (SSN) for business. This helps the IRS keep track of companys earnings and payments to employees.

Now you are wondering do I actually need this? If you are the only one working in your business, no you don't need one but some bank require you get one.
articles.author: Afterwards
